Package de.oth.blocklib.world

Class DayNightLighting

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.world.DayNightLighting
public class DayNightLighting
extends java.lang.Object
The DayNightLighting is a special Light, that changes its position and color depending on a night-day-cycle. Its usage can be enabled in the Configuration and the duration of a day and a night can be chosen.
Author:
Tobias Mueller, Marc Ebbinger WS17/18, Sven Kalle SS 2018

    • setDayNightLength

      public void setDayNightLength​(float dayTimeLength, float nightTimeLength)
      Set a new length for the day and night phases of the Day-Night cycle
      Parameters:
      dayTimeLength - The length of a day in seconds
      nightTimeLength - The length of a night in seconds

      Returns:
      blendFactor that is used for mixing two skybox textures.

      public boolean getDayTime()

    • getSunUp

      public org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f getSunUp()
      Calculates the unit vector pointing up as seen from the sun.
      Returns:
      up vector with a length of 1

    • getSunRight

      public org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f getSunRight()
      Calculates the unit vector pointing right as seen from the sun.
      Returns:
      right vector with a length of 1

    • getPosition

      public org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f getPosition()
      Get position (Vector3f) of the light
      Returns:
      position of the light as a cartesian coordinate
      See Also:
      Vector3f

    • getCurrentLightBrightness

      public float getCurrentLightBrightness()
      Returns:
      current lightBrightnessTemp value, that is adjusted during the update(float) method to create a smooth transition between two lightBrightness values

    • getLightBrightness

      public float getLightBrightness()
      Returns:
      current lightBrightness value

    • setLightBrightness

      public void setLightBrightness​(float colorBrightness)
      Set a factor for the color brightness. Values < 1 will create a shade (make the light darker), Values > 1 will make the light brighter

    • getColour

      public org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f getColour()
      Get colour of the light
      Returns:
      the colour of the light
      See Also:
      Vector3f

    • getClock

      public float getClock()
      Get the current world time
      Returns:
      the current world time

    • setClock

      public void setClock​(float clock)
      Set the current time of day in the world. The following conditions apply will be met for the actual clock value that will be set:
      this.clock = [0 ; this.wholeDayLength]
      Parameters:
      clock - the desired world time

    • update

      public void update​(float deltaTime)
      The update method is called once in every game loop cycle.
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - the time that has passed since the last update.

    • updateLightPosition

      private void updateLightPosition​(float progress, boolean day)
      Calculates the position of the sun during the day and the moon during the night
      Parameters:
      progress - ranges from -1 (morning) over 0 (midday/midnight) to 1 (evening)
      day - true during the day, false during the night. Typically described by (clock <= dayTimeLength)

    • updateLightColor

      private void updateLightColor​(float progress, boolean day)
      Updates the sun (or moon) color by interpolating between two colors. The colors are chosen based on the time of day or night which are divided in 4 segments each
      Parameters:
      progress - ranges from -1 (morning) over 0 (midday/midnight) to 1 (evening)
      day - true during the day, false during the night. Typically described by (clock <= dayTimeLength)

    • updateSkyColor

      private void updateSkyColor​(float progress, boolean day)
      Updates the sky color by interpolating between two colors. The colors are chosen based on the time of day or night which are divided in 4 segments each
      Parameters:
      progress - ranges from -1 (morning) over 0 (midday/midnight) to 1 (evening)
      day - true during the day, false during the night. Typically described by (clock <= dayTimeLength)

    • printDaytime

      private void printDaytime​(java.lang.String prefix)
      Used for debugging. prints the current daytime when the internal clock reaches a full second. Uses the attribute lastDaytimestampFullSecond to keep track of the last full second.
      Parameters:
      prefix - A String to be appended to the beginning of the output. Used to distinguish between Client and Server

    • getDayProgress

      private float getDayProgress()
      calculates the progress of the day, ranging from -1 (morning) over 0 (midday) to 1 (evening)

    • getNightProgress

      private float getNightProgress()
      calculates the progress of the night, ranging from 1 (evening) over 0 (midnight) to -1 (morning)

    • interpolateColor

      private org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f interpolateColor​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f startColor, org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f endColor, float startProgress, float endProgress, float progress)

    • getDayTimeLength

      public float getDayTimeLength()
      Returns:
      the currently set length of a day [in seconds]

    • getNightTimeLength

      public float getNightTimeLength()
      Returns:
      the currently set length of a night [in seconds]
